name: blake2b_text_hash_with_key
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool hashing_api.
Tool description: Blake2B/MD5/SHA Text/File/Bytes Hashing
API description: Hash text (as query-string-parameter) with private-key (as query-string-parameter) using blake2b algorithm.

keystring.description: The key to be used for hashing the text.
